AA.name: On surface
AA.desc: To indicate that the entity being specified is on the surface.

AB.name: Off surface
AB.desc: To indicate that the entity being specified is off the surface.

AC.name: Soluble
AC.desc:
Specifies that the surface/layer/position being described is the
                                    soluble portion.

AD.name: Opposite corners
AD.desc:
The surface or layer of the product being described is the opposite
                                    corners.

AE.name: Corner Diagonals
AE.desc:
The surface or layer of the product being described are the corner
                                    diagonals.

AF.name: Port
AF.desc: The left-hand side (looking forward) of a ship, boat or aircraft.

AG.name: Starboard
AG.desc: The right-hand side (looking forward) of a ship, boat or aircraft.

AH.name: Tooth facial surface
AH.desc:
Surface of a tooth directed toward the face and opposite the lingual
                                    surface.

AI.name: Tooth incisal surface
AI.desc:
Surface of the tooth relating to the cutting edge of the anterior
                                    teeth, incisors or canines.

AJ.name: Tooth distal surface
AJ.desc:
Surface of the tooth toward the back of the dental arch, or away from
                                    the midline.

AK.name: Tooth buccal surface
AK.desc: Surface of the tooth pertaining to or around the cheek.

AL.name: Tooth occlusal surface
AL.desc:
Surface of the tooth pertaining to the masticating surfaces of the
                                    posterior teeth.

AM.name: Tooth lingual surface
AM.desc: Surface of the tooth pertaining to or around the tongue.

AN.name: Tooth mesial surface
AN.desc: Surface of the tooth toward the midline of the dental arch.

BC.name: Back of cab
BC.desc: The location is at the back of the cab.

BT.name: Bottom
BT.desc: The location is on the bottom.

DF.name: Dual fuel tank positions
DF.desc: The location is in the dual fuel tank positions.

FR.name: Front
FR.desc: The location is in the front.

IN.name: Inside
IN.desc: The location is in the inside.

LE.name: Left
LE.desc: The location is on the left.

OS.name: One side
OS.desc: The location is on one side.

OT.name: Outside
OT.desc: The location is on the outside.

RI.name: Right
RI.desc: The location is on the right.

RR.name: Rear
RR.desc: The location is in the rear.

ST.name: Spare tyre position
ST.desc: The location is the spare tyre position.

TB.name: Tank bottom
TB.desc: The location is at the tank bottom.

TP.name: Top
TP.desc: The location is on the top.

TS.name: Two sides
TS.desc: The location is on two sides.

UC.name: Under cab
UC.desc: The location is under the cab.
